channel.title: Recipes on xhocquet.info
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on xhocquet.info

item.title: Classic Baguettes
item.description: Ingredients Starter (Poolish) 113 grams cool water 1/16 teaspoon acive dry yeast or instant yeast 120 grams unbleached all-purpose flour Dough 1 1/2 teaspoon active dry yeast or instant yeast 255 grams lukewarm water poolish 418 grams unbleached all-purpose flour 2 teaspoons salt Summary Make starter and let rest overnight Make dough and let rest 45 + 45 minutes Split dough and let rest 15 minutes - 1 hour Shape loaves, let rest 45 minutes - 1 hour Bake ~30 minutes Directions To make the starter: Mix everything together to make a soft dough.

item.title: Korean Beef Lettuce Wraps
item.description: Ingredients 1 head lettuce with large leaves 1 lb lean ground beef ½ cup brown sugar ¼ cup soy sauce/tamari 1 tablespoon sesame oil; divided in half 3 cloves garlic; minced/grated ¼ teaspoon. ground ginger ⅛ teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional and to taste) 1 bunch green onions; divided between white and green parts 3 tablespoon rice wine vinegar

item.title: Traditional Mayonnaise
item.description: Ingredients 1 egg yolk 1 tablespoon good, strong mustard 1 splash vinegar 100 ml oil (olive or avocado for example) salt pepper Recipe Get all your ingredients to room temperature Mix together the egg yolk, mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper Add the oil bit-by-bit as you whisk the mixture. The mayo should gradually thicken Optionally add some lemon or herbs to flavor

item.title: Quick-n-Dirty Crusty Bread
item.description: Ingredients 3 cups lukewarm water 2 lbs. unbleached all-purpose flour 1 tablespoon salt 1 1/2 tablespoons instant or active dry yeast Summary Directions Combine all of the ingredients in a large mixing bowl Mix by hand to make a very sticky, rough dough. Cover the bowl, and let the dough rise at room temperature for 2 hours. (optional in case of rush)
